actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the aid and attendance allowance payable to veterans and surviving spouses of veterans.

summary.text: Increases to $150 the aid and attendance allowance payable to veterans with non-services connected disabilities. Increases such allowances for surviving spouses of veterans from $69 a month to $75. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521(d); 544)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to increase the aid and attendance allowance payable to veterans and surviving spouses of veterans.
